record.dc:title: 54BN12 Eva, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 6BN73, adult male in good condition, fully flexed on left side and stomach with head to SE. A dog femur, canine tooth and a worked antler flaker at the pelvis. Stratum I. Square 50CA. Direction West.
record.wpa:narrative: Associations might not be valid - were almost in contact, however, with the bones.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has small illustration of burial on file.
